title: [K-12] Analysis of Factors Influencing LMS Utilization: Extended TAM Model-Based Educational Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary computer literacy and familiarity with LMS basic interfaces
context.additional_context: LMS competency enhancement program for simulation/VR-based science learning environments.

learning_goals: The impact of extended Technology Acceptance Model (TAM) core elements (technical support, instructional design, self-efficacy) on LMS usage can be explained
A project analyzing perceived usefulness and perceived ease of use of LMS in simulation/VR environments can be conducted
A report evaluating LMS usage influencing factors by applying structural equation modeling (SEM)-based research methodology can be written

resources: TAM (Technology Acceptance Model) extended framework template

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
